markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Vanara Weapon Expertise](/Feats.aspx?ID=4019) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Vanara" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=368" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 57</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Vanara Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=4004)

</column>

---

Thanks to numerous joyous practice exercises, you've become an expert in vanara weapons. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the [bo staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=17), [chakram](/Weapons.aspx?ID=235), [katar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=14), [panabas](/Weapons.aspx?ID=265), [urumi](/Weapons.aspx?ID=102), and all [vanara](/Traits.aspx?ID=368) weapons in which you're trained.
name: Vanara Weapon Expertise
